title: Small Pets Okay! Studio With Separate Kitchen
posting_body: Call  or text Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for reference #1325369.
Large studio with a unique layout located a block away from the Sheridan Red Line stop!
This studio features a separate kitchen with updated cabinetry, hardwood floors throughout,  an rehabbed bath with new tiling and fixtures, and high ceilings!
HEAT AND COOKING GAS ARE INCLUDED!
Live down the street from Holiday Club, Walgreens, and a wide array of different shops and eateries!
Cats and small dogs are welcome!
Pics may not be of exact units.
***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #
